resources.comments: Network interface for edge virtual machine to use.
resources.name: [variables('nicResourceName')]

resources.comments: Virtual machine hosting the IoT Edge installation.
resources.name: [variables('vmName')]

resources.comments: One time script execution to install and onboard IoT Edge and deploy workloads
resources.name: [concat(variables('vmName'), '/', 'scriptextensions')]

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
promMetrics_CL
| where Name_s startswith "iiot_edge_discovery" 
| summarize max(Value_s) by Name_s

content.Query:
promMetrics_CL
| where Name_s startswith "iiot_edge_discovery" 
| summarize Count = max(Value_s) by Name_s

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
promMetrics_CL
| where  Name_s startswith "iiot"  and Name_s endswith "reconnected" 
| extend module = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).module) 
| extend device = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).device) 
| summarize max(Value_s) by Name_s, module, device

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
promMetrics_CL
| where  Name_s startswith "iiot_edge"  and Name_s endswith "connected" and Name_s !contains "device" 
| extend module = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).module) 
| extend device = tostring(parse_json(Tags_s).device) 
//| summarize Count = max(Value_s)  by Name_s, module, device 
| project TimeGenerated, strcat(device ,"-", module ,"-", Name_s) , toint(Value_s)   
| render timechart

resources.comments: Network interface for simulation virtual machine to use.
resources.name: [concat(variables('simulationName'), copyIndex(), '-nic')]

resources.comments: One time script execution to prepare the VM environment
resources.name: [concat(variables('simulationName'), copyIndex(), '/', 'scriptextensions')]

protectedSettings.commandToExecute: [concat('sudo bash simulation.sh ', ' --admin ', parameters('edgeUsername'), ' --name ', parameters('simulationProfile'), ' --imagesNamespace ', concat('"', parameters('imagesNamespace'), '"'), ' --imagesTag ', concat('"', parameters('imagesTag'), '"'), ' --dockerServer ', concat('"', parameters('dockerServer'), '"'), ' --dockerUser ', concat('"', parameters('dockerUser'), '"'), ' --dockerPassword ', concat('"', parameters('dockerPassword'), '"'))]
